A dog leash with a built-in microphone that allows the owner to listen to their dog's barks and whines, and a built-in speaker that allows the owner to communicate with their dog.
A dog leash with a built-in water bottle holder that keeps the dog hydrated during walks.
A dog leash with a built-in treats holder that allows the owner to give their dog a treat while on a walk.
A dog leash with a built-in collar that can be used to attach a leash to a harness, making it easier to control the dog.
A dog leash with a built-in shock collar that can be used to train the dog to obey commands.
